content: making memories crochet beanie is an intermediate level crochet beanie with a lovely unique texture that is snuggly to wear a sizing table is provided so that the beanie can be made with any 10ply/worsted yarn recommended or 8ply/dk yarn also suitable for standard child/tween/woman/man size the basic beanie design and a single brim option is available for free from my blog the pdf version of the pattern includes multiple brim options and images for 3l and 4l location **receive 50% off in cart on may 12 only for mother s day same applies for all my beanie patterns no coupon required discount will apply in cart ** **pattern details** beanie size size to preference the pattern includes a sizing table based on the american yarn council standard head sizes for child tween woman and man the beanie can also be made to measure for child size upwards skill level intermediate stitch terminology us refer also to abbreviations and special stitch instructions recommended yarn 10 ply/worsted/cat 4 weight yarn of any fibre that provides a good stitch definition i e avoid fluffy feathery or heavily textured yarns an 8ply/dk/cat 3 weight yarn can also be used if preferred example project yarns are provided in appendix a also refer to ravelry for additional yarn inspiration hook follow yarn label as a guide or use your preferred hook swatch and adjust hook if/as necessary to achieve the preferred density of crochet fabric gauge not important for this item ensure beanie circumference and length approximates the sizing table pattern synopsis constructed working in rounds from bottom to top using a modified shell including stitches in 3lo for texture the brim is added next multiple options are provided social media share please tag me @thecrochetfix and hash tag your
